import React from "react"; function Aboutpage() { return ( <>

Hi, I'm Ankur Mehta!

I'm a recently graduated Product Design
and Human-Computer Interaction student
from Carnegie Mellon University.

My education and work experiences have taught me the need for constant learning and evolving in the career of a designer. I believe that there is no formula to a good user experience and every project provides an opportunity for discovery.

With a passion for user-centered design, a problem solving approach, and a strong growth mindset, my intent is to test the boundaries of user interactions and create innovative product experiences.

); } export default Aboutpage;
